name: Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Pillars of Eternity II Deadfire/PillarsOfEternityII.exe

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the GOG setup exe
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Pillars of Eternity II Deadfire/PillarsOfEternityII.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Running GOG Installer
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE: 1
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    __GL_SHADER_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    __GL_THREADED_OPTIMIZATION: 1
    mesa_glthread: 'true'
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  overrides:
    xaudio2_7: native,builtin
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
